trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a segment directory is missing from the pipeline directory structure.
trans-unit.target: 管線目錄結構遺漏區段目錄時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When an add-in is activated, its pipeline to the host is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 啟動增益集時，同時會建構通往主應用程式的管線。

trans-unit.source: The add-in system requires that pipeline segments be placed in a specified directory structure with specified directory names, as described in [Pipeline Development Requirements](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ef9fa986-e80b-43e1-868b-247f4c1d9da5).
trans-unit.target: 增益集系統要求，管線區段應置於指定的目錄名稱與指定的目錄結構中所述[管線開發需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ef9fa986-e80b-43e1-868b-247f4c1d9da5)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error (for example, "The target application domain has been unloaded.").
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤 （例如，"目標應用程式定義域已經卸載。"）。

trans-unit.source: This message takes the current system culture into account.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination object data.
trans-unit.target: 來源或目的端物件資料的相關內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> class with serialization data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute an exception object that is transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 以重新構成經由資料流傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 Null 參考，則會在處理內部例外狀況的 catch 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed to the constructor, or a null reference if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值，如果傳遞至建構函式，則為 null 參考<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSegmentDirectoryNotFoundException> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。
